name: unBorn
description: Help a lonely spermatozoon survive his ultimate journey, and solve what has been haunting his dreams all his life - what he calls, "The Ovum"! Join him on his quest of survival where you will face hordes of ravenous std's, and stare down mega organisms who have never met defeat!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL-capable graphics card,  128MB or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
